title: Forecast Clinical Trial Supply Needs
description: A supply chain manager needs to forecast the total amount of investigational product needed for the entire duration of a global clinical trial.

tasks.description: Input the key trial parameters into a forecasting tool (e.g., number of patients, number of sites, treatment duration, dosage).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately enters all parameters from the protocol.

tasks.description: Run a simulation to model the supply needs over the life of the study, accounting for variables like patient recruitment rates.
Analyze the output to determine the total number of kits to manufacture.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent analyzes the report and determines the total required quantity, including overage.

tasks.description: Generate a report to inform the manufacturing and packaging plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a formal report that will be used to schedule the manufacturing of the clinical trial material.
